{{Infobox Embedded System |image1 = TP-LINK Deco X73-DSL.jpg |image1_size = 150px |caption = AX5400 VDSL Whole Home Mesh Wi-Fi 6 System |caption2 = <!-- 2nd tagleine --> |pp = https://www.tp-link.com/uk/home-networking/deco/deco-x73-dsl/ |sp = <!-- Support page url only --> |dl = <!-- Download page url only --> |wikidevi = <!-- wikidevi.wi-cat.ru page, included underscores --> |wikipedia = <!-- [[wikipedia:Main Page|Wikipedia]] Leave blank for none --> |ddwrtsupport = <!-- Activation, Donation, Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, TBD, Unofficially, WIP --> |openwrtsupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |tomatosupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, --> |gargoylesupport = <!-- Incompatible, Not Supported, Partial Support, Supported, WIP, Unofficially, -->
|brand = TP-LINK |model = Deco X73 |submodelappend = <!-- yes, for space --> |submodel = -DSL |revision = v1 |subrevision = <!-- Model Subrevision, Leave blank for none or unknown --> |model_part_num = |page_start_date = |page_start_origon = |wlclass = AX5400 |series = <!-- Device series --> |type = dsl modem, wireless router, wireless system |sernum = <!-- First 4 or so for easy version identification --> |fcc_id = <!-- Federal Communication Commission Identification Number --> |icid = <!-- Industry Canada Identification number, Leave blank for unknown --> |us_id = <!-- US ID number --> |boardid = <!-- Board Identification, Leave blank for none --> |ecc_id = <!-- eec-id -->
|cpu1chip1 = Qualcomm;IPQ5018; |cpu1_cores = 2 |cpu1_type = ARM |cpu1_type_rev = Cortex-A53 |cpu1spd = 1.0 GHz |is_doc = |bus = <!-- 8-bit, 16-bit, 32-bit, 64-bit, Leave blank for none -->
|flash1type = <!-- Parallel,Serial(SPI),SPI NOR,NAND,Compact Flash, --> |fla1_num = <!-- 1,2,3,4 --> |fla1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |flash1size = 256 |flash1maxsize = <!-- Maximum size firmware can be in bytes -->
|ram1type = <!-- DDR,DDR2,DDR3,DDR4, --> |ram1type1 = <!-- SO-DIMM,SDRAM, --> |ram1spd = <!-- RAM speed --> |ram1size = 512 |ram1chip = <!-- Brand;Model;Extra, info; --> |ram1_num = <!-- Number of Ram chips --> |nvramsize = <!-- 32, 60, 64, etc... in kb, Leave blank for unknown -->
|eth_cpu = true |sw1chip = Realtek;RTL8367S; |dsl_ports = 1 |voip_ports = 2 |wan_ports = 1 |wan_speed = 1GbE |lan_ports = 3 |lan_speed = 1GbE |ethstandard = <!-- auto --> |portbasedvlan = <!-- Support for port based vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |802.1qvlan = <!-- Support for 802.1q vlan tagging, Leave blank for unknown --> |auto_mdix = <!-- mdix support --> |sup_jumbo = <!-- Jumbo frames support --> |ethoui = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |oui = <!-- Wireless OUI -->
|bootwait = <!-- On or Off, Leave blank for unknown --> |stockbootloader = U-Boot;;; |stockos = Linux;4.4.60;;
|exp_if_types = USB 3.0 |exp_sim_num = <!-- Number of sim Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_pcmcia_num = <!-- Number of pcmcia ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_expcard_num = <!-- Number of Expresscard ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipci_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCI Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_minipcie_num = <!-- Number of Mini PCIexpress Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_usb_num = 1 |exp_cf_num = <!-- Number Compact Flash Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sdmmc_num = <!-- Number SD/MMC Slots, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ide_num = <!-- Number of ide ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_ata_num = <!-- Number of ATA Ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sata_num = <!-- Number of sata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_esata_num = <!-- Number of esata ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_parallel = <!-- Number of parallel ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_sfp_num = <!-- Number of sfp ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_M.2 = <!-- Number of M.2 ports, Leave blank for none --> |exp_hdmi_num = |usb_hub = <!-- USB hub compatibility -->
|pwr_volt_type = VDC |pwr_vdc = 12 |pwr_amp_dc = 2 |pwr_conn = barrel |pwr_barrel_outer = <!-- Outer barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_inner = <!-- Inner barrel size in mm --> |pwr_barrel_len = <!-- Length of barrel --> |pwr_pol = <!-- Connector polarity -->
|serial = <!-- Full Serial info --> |jtag = <!-- Full JTAG info -->
|specialfeat = <!-- Features that don't fit any place else, Leave blank for none --> |flags = Wi-Fi 6, 1024QAM, MU-MIMO, ADSL2+, VDSL |addchip = <!-- Additional Chips --> |802dot11_protocols = abgn+ac+ax
|defaulip = <!-- ???.???.???.???, default IP Address --> |defaultlogin = <!-- default Login Name, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultpass = <!-- default Password, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid = <!-- default Wireless ID, Leave blank for unknown --> |defaultssid_regex = |default_ch = <!-- Defaults channel(s) Radio(s) are set to --> |is_manuf = Yes |tpfirmware = <!-- Third party firmware official support, AsusWRT-Merlin, CeroWrt, DD-WRT, DD-WRT (kong), DD-WRT (kongac), DD-WRT (kongarm), FreedomBox, FreshTomato-ARM, Gargoyle, LibreWrt, Oleg (wl500g), Oleg-ng (wl500g), OpenWrt, Tomato, Tomato RAF, Tomato (shibby), Tomato (Toastman), TomatoUSB, Wive-NG -->
|availability = <!-- Market availability --> |eoldate = <!-- End of Life date --> |fccapprovdate = <!-- FCCID approval date --> |estreldate = 03/2022 |estprice = <!-- Estimated retail price in US dollars --> |upc = <!-- UPC number --> |ean = <!-- EAN number --> |dx_sku = <!-- DealExtreme sku --> |newegg = <!-- newegg item number --> |asin = B09VPRPTBJ |asin_country = UK |asin2 = <!-- ASIN number --> |asin_country2 = <!-- ASIN country --> |countrymanuf = China
|buttons = <!-- buttons available --> |led = <!-- Led colors and descriptions --> |dimensions = <!-- Size of device {{convert |length|x|widthordepth|x|height|in|mm}} --> |weight = <!-- Weight of device {{convert|weight|oz|g}} -->
|wi1_if_name = |rad1chip1cpu = true |rad1oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad1_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad1txchains = 2 |rad1rxchains = 2 |rad1sstreams = 2 |rad1stand = IEEE 802.11b/g/n/ax |rad1ax = 574 |nqam1 = <!-- 600, 800, 900, 1000, --> |rad1n = 300 |rad1g = 54 |rad1b = 11 |rad1freq = 2.4
|wi2_if_name = |rad2chip1 = Qualcomm;QCN9024; |rad2oui = <!-- Only if different from above OUI --> |rad2_ant_conn = <!-- Leave blank for unknown --> |rad2txchains = 4 |rad2rxchains = 4 |rad2sstreams = 4 |rad2stand = IEEE 802.11a/n/ac/ax |rad2ax = 4804 |acqam2 = <!-- AC-qam --> |rad2ac = 1733 |rad2n = 600 |rad2a = 54 |rad2freq = 5
}}{{TIDTOC|embedded}} ==Overview== *VDSL Modem Router + Mesh WiFi - Save a modem, and gain better WiFi experience *Super VDSL2 Speed - Supports Profile 35b tech to deliver downstream up to 350 Mbps* *Superior WiFi 6 speeds up to 5.4 Gbps - 4804 Mbps (5 GHz) and 574 Mbps (2.4 GHz) dual-band WiFi with WiFi 6 technology *Fully Gigabit Ethernet - 4x Gigabit WAN/LAN Ethernet ports provide flexible internet access at warp speed** *3 RJ11 Ports - 1 DSL + 2 FXS *TP-Link HomeShield - Real-time IoT and network protection, robust Parental Controls, and comprehensive reports§ *True Seamless Roaming Mesh WiFi - Walk through your home and stay connected with the fastest possible speeds‡
===Partition Table=== {| class="wikitable" |+ Partition Table |- | SBL1 || 0x00000000 || 0x00080000 || 0 || 0 || 0 || 1 || bin/sbl1_nand.mbn |- | MIBIB || 0x00080000 || 0x00080000 || 0 || 0 || 0 || 1 || bin/nand-system-partition-ipq5018.bin |- | boot-config_0 || 0x00100000 || 0x00040000 || 0 || 0 || 0 || 1 || bin/bootconfig.bin |- | boot-config_1 || 0x00140000 || 0x00040000 || 0 || 0 || 0 || 1 || bin/bootconfig.bin |- | QSEE || 0x00180000 || 0x00100000 || 0 || 0 || 0 || 1 || bin/tz.mbn |- | DEVCFG || 0x00280000 || 0x00040000 || 0 || 0 || 0 || 1 || bin/devcfg.mbn |- | CDT || 0x002c0000 || 0x00040000 || 0 || 0 || 0 || 1 || bin/cdt-AP-MP03.1_256M16_DDR3.bin |- | uboot-env || 0x00300000 || 0x00080000 || 0 || 0 || 0 || 0 || # |- | uboot || 0x00380000 || 0x00140000 || 0 || 0 || 0 || 1 || bin/openwrt-ipq5018-u-boot.mbn |- | radio || 0x004c0000 || 0x00100000 || 0 || 1 || 0 || 0 || # |- | TRAINING || 0x005c0000 || 0x00080000 || 0 || 0 || 0 || 0 || # |- | file-system@0 || 0x00640000 || 0x02a00000 || 0 || 0 || 2 || 1 || bin/root.ubi |- | file-system@1 || 0x03040000 || 0x02a00000 || 0 || 0 || 1 || 1 || bin/root.ubi |- | ETHPHYFW || 0x05a40000 || 0x00080000 || 0 || 0 || 0 || 0 || # |- | factory_data || 0x05ac0000 || 0x00900000 || 0 || 0 || 0 || 1 || bin/factory_data.ubi |- | runtime_data || 0x063c0000 || 0x01100000 || 0 || 0 || 0 || 1 || bin/runtime_data.ubi |- | voicemail_data || 0x074c0000 || 0x07800000 || 0 || 0 || 0 || 1 || bin/voicemail_data.ubi |}
